Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Milestones.Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS
REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS

Title: Requires the prior approval of the appropriate legislative committees required of agency rules and regulations
Summary: Requires state agencies to submit proposed rules and regulations intended to implement legislation to the appropriate committee of the legislature for approval; provides that no such rule or regulation shall take effect unless it has been approved by a majority vote of such legislative committee.
LawCode: Add ยง202-f, St Ad Proc Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state administrative procedure act, in relation to legislative approval of certain proposed rules
